content: **crochet drops hat in bomull-lin or paris ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no l-118 yarn group c~ ---------------------------------------------------------- **measurements** circumference approx 48 cm / 19 around the head height approx 26 cm / 10 1/4 **materials** drops bomull-lin from garnstudio 100 g color no 05 brown or drops paris from garnstudio 100 g color no 26 dark beige drops crochet hook size 4 5 mm/ us 7 or size needed to get 20 double_crochet x 8 row = 10 x 10 cm / 4 x 4
